summary: A fourteen-year-old aspiring violinist finds herself under an increasing amount of pressure to keep secrets for herself, her family and her newfound best friend.
cast: Evan Rachel Wood|Michael Angarano|David Gallagher|Vivica A. Fox|Jan Broberg|Rick Macy|Paul Kiernan|Tayva Patch|Danielle C. Ryan|Caitlin E.J. Meyer|Micah Schow|Landon Kunzelman|RuDee Sade|Haley McCormick|Wayne Brennan|Joey Miyashima|Micaela Nelligan|Janice Knickrehm|Erica Angarano|Carli Treu|Matt Grace|Dustin Harding|Robin Ballard|Elizabeth Grand|Christy Summerhays|Clara Susan Morey II|Tracy Scott|Queenie Aydelott|James Bereece|Kurt Bestor|Carleton Bluford|Gary Constable|J. Dhylan Meyer|Brian Sullivan
title: El rincón de los secretos
